channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- Workload Automation
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- Workload Automation

item.title: CVE-2023-28009|2023-04-26T19:38:54.631Z -- hcl%20software -- workload%20automation
item.description: HCL Workload Automation is vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources.

item.title: CVE-2023-28008|2023-04-26T19:24:37.974Z -- hcl%20software -- workload%20automation
item.description: HCL Workload Automation 9.4, 9.5, and 10.1 are vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources.
